summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of East 65th Street (south side) from a point approximately 48 feet west of the west margin of 30th Avenue Northwest to the east margin of 35th Avenue Northwest; by paving and otherwise improving the same, all in accordance with Resolution No. 7450, of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district thereof, and providing that payment for said improvement shall be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment in Bonds."
